value.halfverse:
nor lingered in the way of sinners,
nor sat in the seats of the scornful!
value.verse: Happy are they who have not walked in the counsel of the wicked, *

value.halfverse: and they meditate on his law day and night.
value.verse: Their delight is in the law of the LORD, *

They are like trees planted by streams of water,
bearing fruit in due season, with leaves that do not wither; *

value.halfverse: they are like chaff which the wind blows away.
value.verse: It is not so with the wicked; *
Therefore the wicked shall not stand upright when judgment comes, *
value.halfverse: nor the sinner in the council of the righteous.
but the way of the wicked is doomed.
value.verse: For the LORD knows the way of the righteous, *
